body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Square-Toe Ballet Flat
features: COMFORT AND FIT: These square-toe ballet flats have a padded insole with high-quality memory foam for added comfort and a heel pillow to relieve pressure and heel slip.
MATERIAL: Amazon Essentials shoes are made from high-quality alternative leather materials. This style has a faux kidsuede upper and is lined in faux suede.
STYLE: These ballet flats have a stylish square-toe, folded edges without stitching, and a modern upper design.
DETAILS: 1/4 inch heel with a flexible non-slip sole.
DESIGN: These ballet flats take you from day to night and can be paired with your favorite Amazon Essentials outfit.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,358 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #105 in Women's Flats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These flats are super cute and comfortable. I wore them with a long beige dress for a special ceremony & they matched perfectly! I recommend these flats for sure, especially that I’m not even a flat girl.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and not sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The blush color is excellent and not too pink-ish. Bought a 1/2 size smaller as previous reviews indicated it fits large. Concur. Glad I ordered 0.5 size smaller--good fit as is.Material cloth not leather and sole comfortable, but thin. Materials not meant to last or endure. Shoe hardly noticeable on feet--think more like sturdy sock. More warm temps, house or office desk shoe not for walking/hike--even a little! Feels like a (lasting) one-summer/comfortable near daily wear kind-of-flat.Pleased w purchase as this is what I had looked for and it fits the bill for the current price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wore this at work a whole first day of use and they never hurt. They fit perfectly as expected. The fake suede aspect adds a touch of elegance to this inexpensive product, that doesn't look it. I like them so much that I will order another color for leisure use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice look but runs big
reviews.reviewText: I ordered my usual size but they were too big by about a half size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too Big After 1 Wear
reviews.reviewText: I wore these shoes once. Initially they fit great. By the end of the day, they had stretched so much they no longer fit. They literally fall off the back of my foot if I try to wear them now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tipss for those with foot issues
reviews.reviewText: I have a number of foot issues so I need to "customize my shoes" , these worked great. They are now extremely comfortable, supportive, and attractive. Here's how: I have one foot that is a size 12 and the other is 13., and consequently some mild bunion issues. One of my legs is a bit shorter than the others so I need a stable shoe. I hate orthopedic shoes, and they are ridiculously expensive.I have learned to solve these issues by finding a couple different types of shoe inserts that are comfortable, have a good arch support, and are cushy. I like memory foam and I have one heavenly set of fleece inserts. I have a couple of thin insoles and a few sets of thicker ones. Be careful not to get the insert too thick or there will be no room for your heel. These shoes are deep enough I can even use my fleece inserts. Always get the shoe to fit the large foot, in my case I bought the 13s, they are true to size.I custom fit shoes with cotton wool (a real cotton ball pulled apart and shaped as needed) in the toe of the shoe that is too long. I use heel pads on the back of the heels, usually silicone for a snug fit and to prevent slipping, although a little hair spray works well for that too. Then add the insert of my choice and voila!If necessary, I tuck little cotton wool tucked into strategic places to relieve pressure points and the shoes fit like a glove.I know it sounds like a lot of bother, but the insoles are interchangeable from shoe to shoe and I just leave the heel pads and cotton in the toe until it needs changing. It only takes a few minutes to custom fit them and I can wear them all day. It is not very costly, so I can have several pairs of cute inexpensive shoes that fit and support as well as the expensive ones.Hope this helps someone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent flat dress shoe, but size down.
reviews.reviewText: I don't do heels anymore, not since quarantine, and I usually wear the Belice flats (also from Amazon). However, I wanted something a bit more unique to wear to work, and I think these fit the bill. They sort of look like pointe shoes with the square toe, which I think is more stylish than the regular round-toed flats.I usually wear a size 9, but had to size down to an 8.5 in these because they were too long and kept slipping off of my feet. Once I had the right size, there was no break-in period at all and no blistering-- they just fit. This is not true of all Amazon flats-- the pointy-toed loafers and the pointed flats both gave me horrible blisters-- but both these and the Belice version are great.The material is some sort of microsuede situation. I wouldn't want to get them wet, but it doesn't show much wear so far.As with most cheap flats, the sole will eventually start peeling, but I usually get maybe half a year of near-constant wear out of these, so the price per wear is really not bad. I will likely buy another pair when these wear out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and affordable
reviews.reviewText: These shoes are super comfortable, so much so that I'm buying a second pair! Just be sure to use Scotchguard and you're good to go!

This is perhaps the best shoe I've found at such a low price point. I have "duck" feet (wide at front and narrow at heel) and these fit perfectly. They are extremely comfortable and are my new neutral flat that I can wear with pants or a skirt! I can tell they won't last long because of the construction, but I'm ok with it considering how stylish and comfortable they are. I did size down like the other reviews recommended and they fit perfectly.
Passt perfekt, leicht und gut zu tragen. Hatte sie auf einer Hochzeit ab, also wirklich lange und ich musste sie nicht ausziehen ;)

"Estos zapatos en talla grande son un verdadero hallazgo. Como alguien que siempre ha tenido dificultades para encontrar calzado cómodo en mi talla, estos zapatos son una bendición. La comodidad es excepcional; la amortiguación en la suela hace que durante horas caminar sea un placer . Además, el diseño es elegante y versátil, lo que los convierte en una excelente elección para cualquier ocasión. La calidad del material es evidente y garantiza durabilidad. En resumen, estos zapatos en talla grande son un imprescindible para aquellas de nosotras que Necesitamos una talla más grande sin sacrificar estilo o comodidad. ¡Los recomiendo altamente!"

reviews.reviewText: morbida , bella da vedere, come una ballerina un po più elegante.
